DOC.detailed_description: Participants identify administrative data model predict high risk future healthcare utilization . Participants invite study mail . After informed consent participant randomize either active treatment control 3:1 . Active patient depth interview specially trained nurse . Further counsel telephone weekly 6-9 month . Quality Life measure SF-36 every 3 month one year active participant control .
